programme.episode_description: Ryder and the pups must help get a surprise birthday cake up to Jake's cabin; the PAW Patrol must come to the rescue when Alex and Daring Danny X snowboard toward Risky Ridge.
The pups go to Barkingburg to investigate when the Princess thinks she has seen a ghost; while on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask
Lord Boateng

programme.original_episode_title: How Prayer and Fasting Influence Earth
programme.episode_description: This teaching is entitled How Prayer and Fasting Influence Earth and is from the series Kingdom Culture Influence Volume 2 - The Kingdom Culture of Prayer. This series is available exclusively on our Munroe Global Media app and website.

Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.

programme.original_title: SISTA SHOW: Episode 1 Quick Fire with Elodie Zone
programme.original_episode_title: SISTA SHOW: Episode 1 Quick Fire with Elodie Zone
programme.episode_description: Quick Fire with Elodie Zone - It’s edgy, exciting and star-studded, just how we like it!

programme.original_episode_title: Napier Grass, Growing Vegetables, Cow Care
programme.episode_description: In this episode the Shamba Shape Up team look at growing Napier grass, harvesting rain water, improving vegetable crop and have more advice on cattle.
Hilary falls for a shady character named Ice Tray, one of Will's friends from Philadelphia, when he visits Bel-Air.
Lord Grantchester (Labour)

Sibel is a woman whose only priority in life is her job.... Erhan is a man who works in Sibel's company and is preparing to marry Elif, whom he loves very much... While Sibel learns that she needs to have an operation due to cysts in her uterus and that she will not be able to become a mother after the operation, Erhan loses everything in the stock market. The lives of these two opposite people, who hit rock bottom on the same day, will never be the same after Sibel makes an offer to Erhan.
Ryder and the pups must help get a surprise birthday cake up to Jake's cabin; the PAW Patrol must come to the rescue when Alex and Daring Danny X snowboard toward Risky Ridge.
The pups go to Barkingburg to investigate when the Princess thinks she has seen a ghost; while on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask

When Sam is tempted to go in her fathers lab she does it anyway and doesn't know what to say to her father. SuperBook takes the kids to see Adam and Eve and how Satan tricks them into disobeying God. Sam and her friends return home and even though her father is disappointed in his daughters disobedience he still loves her and forgives her.

Chris has never been this excited. His birthday gift is a HoloStation 4, the ultimate holographic gaming system! It's so popular that there aren't enough to go around for all the kids who want one. Such as the sick boy at the local hospital; even the hospital is unable to pull strings to get him one. Chris feels a twinge of guilt, but it takes SUPERBOOK'S ministrations to turn him around. The kids journey to meet Abraham and his beloved son, Isaac, whom he was willing to sacrifice because it's what God wants. Abraham puts God first in his life, above everything else. This has a profound effect on Chris, who returns home to donate his coveted HoloStation 4 to the little boy at the hospital. He sacrifices what is important to him and does it because he knows it's what God is asking him to do.
How Your Muscles Work

1. Wilson / Nicola v. Eddy - Lies and betrayal bring two cousins to court after one had sex with the others girlfriend. The DNA question has torn their families apart and each man hopes to prove he fathered her ten-month-old son.
1. Crawford v. Liggins - After 35 years a woman finds out a man that she has never met may be her biological father. Will three decades of paternity questions be answered today?

programme.original_title: House of Commons on S. Cameroons
programme.original_episode_title: House of Commons on S. Cameroons
programme.episode_description: House_of_Commons_02_03_21_11_36_20 James Duddridge MP, Parliamentary Under-Secretary (Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office) (Rochford and Southend East, Conservative).
Naledi invites the ladies to an unbearable yoga class. While Vegan celebrations are underway, Mercy confronts Lerika about her dodgy friendship with Naledi.

programme.original_episode_title: Funny Faces in Slo-Mo, Remote Controlled Ca
programme.episode_description: A woman tries to order hotel room service from a lamp; a teenager immediately drops her new phone; funny faces in slow-motion; a woman vacuums without noticing the hose is unattached; a remote control car frightens a cat.
Lord Boateng

Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.

Frozen in 1996, Simon Phoenix, a convicted crime lord, is revived for a parole hearing well into the 21st century. Revived into a society free from crime, Phoenix resumes his murderous rampage, and no one can stop him. John Spartan, the police officer who captured Phoenix in 1996, has also been cryogenically frozen, this time for a crime he did not commit. In 2032, the former cities of Los Angeles, San Diego and Santa Barbara have merged into peaceful, utopian San Angeles. Unable to stop him with their non-violent solutions, the police release Spartan to help recapture Phoenix. Now after 36 years, Spartan has to adapt himself to the future society he has no knowledge about.
How Your Tongue Works

programme.original_title: House of Commons on S. Cameroons
programme.original_episode_title: House of Commons on S. Cameroons
programme.episode_description: House_of_Commons_02_03_21_11_36_20 James Duddridge MP, Parliamentary Under-Secretary (Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office) (Rochford and Southend East, Conservative).

Eva Dandridge is a very uptight young woman who constantly meddles in the affairs of her sisters and their husbands. Her in-laws, who are tired of Eva interfering in their lives, decide to set her up with someone so she can leave them alone. They end up paying Ray, the local "playboy," $5,000 to date her. The plan goes by smoothly, but troubles comes when Ray actually falls in love with Eva.

programme.local_episode_title: For survivors of Ebola, the crisis isn't over | Soka Moses
programme.original_episode_title: For survivors of Ebola, the crisis isn't over
programme.episode_description: n 2014, as a newly trained physician, Soka Moses took on one of the toughest jobs in the world: treating highly contagious patients at the height of Liberia's Ebola outbreak. In this intense, emotional talk, he details what he saw on the frontlines of the crisis -- and reveals the challenges and stigma that thousands of survivors still face.

n 2014, as a newly trained physician, Soka Moses took on one of the toughest jobs in the world: treating highly contagious patients at the height of Liberia's Ebola outbreak. In this intense, emotional talk, he details what he saw on the frontlines of the crisis -- and reveals the challenges and stigma that thousands of survivors still face.

programme.episode_description: The pups save a bear that is sleepwalking by helping him get back home before he wakes up. Daring Danny X ends up on a wild ride when he takes his horse off the trail.

programme.original_episode_title: Why Africa must become a center of knowledge again
programme.episode_description: How can Africa, the home to some of the largest bodies of water in the world, be said to have a water crisis? It doesn't, says Olúfẹ́mi Táíwò -- it has a knowledge crisis. Táíwò suggests that lack of knowledge on important topics like water and food is what stands between Africa's current state and a future of prosperity. In a powerful talk, he calls for Africa to make the production of knowledge within the continent rewarding and reclaim its position as a locus of learning on behalf of humanity.

It's time for a musical adventure at Barney's Fantasy Fair! When a little girl named "Melanie" dreams of playing her violin in a talent show, Barney, Baby Bop, and BJ help her realize her dreams with the help of a new dino friend, "Riff", who is Baby Bop's and BJ's cousin. Riff knows how to find music everywhere! Then, he shows the friends all about music and sounds as they sing songs, ride amazing rides, and play games! They also discover that some dreams are even bigger than they imagined. So, let's go to the fair, join in the fun, and let's make music together!

programme.original_episode_title: $20,000 In Child Support, But Is He the Father?
programme.episode_description: 1. Billingsley v. Broadnax - A woman is suing a man for $5,000 because he hasn't done anything for the baby.

programme.original_episode_title: 19 Years of Child Support But Is He the Father?
programme.episode_description: 1. Haralson v. Smith - After nineteen years of paying for child support, this Detriot man finally meets his alleged daughter yet denies paternity.

programme.original_title: The Real Housewives of Johannesburg: Season 1, Episode 6
programme.episode_description: The ladies take a trip to Soweto, Mercy surprises her mother, and nothing goes right at the fashion show.

programme.original_episode_title: A few ways to fix a government | Charity Wayua
programme.episode_description: Charity Wayua put her skills as a cancer researcher to use on an unlikely patient: the government of her native Kenya. She shares how she helped her government drastically improve its process for opening up new businesses, a crucial part of economic health and growth, leading to new investments and a World Bank recognition as a top reformer.

programme.original_episode_title: Easter, A Salute to Hamsters Eating, and Cats
programme.episode_description: Video highlights include Easter egg hunts, a dog who thinks his shadow belongs to another dog, a boy's toy drone gets caught in his mother's hair, and a musical salute to hamsters eating.

programme.local_episode_title: Dairy, Soil test, Banana, Crop Rotation and Vegetables
programme.original_episode_title: Dairy, Soil test, Banana, Crop Rotation and Vegetables
programme.episode_description:
Today we’re in Kirangira Village, Mukono central and we’re meeting with farmer Dorothy Nakalembe. Dorothy’s a very experienced lady who’s been farming since 1980. She has a 3-acre farm where she grows bananas, maize and vegetables .She also has cows but she needs expert advice on them and of course for her vegetables. This is one farmer who knows what she wants!
In this farm we are learning about:
1. Dairy breeding, nutrition and hygiene 2. What to plant after Clearing Banana plantation 3. Soil testing on banana plantation 4. Vegetables transplanting and good farming practices
Today we’re in Kirangira Village, Mukono central and we’re meeting with farmer Dorothy Nakalembe.

programme.episode_description: 1. Mitchell v. Robinson - In Ohio, a man and his new girlfriend deny that he is the father of his ex's baby daughter.

programme.original_episode_title: A Man I Met Online Fathered My Newborn Son
programme.episode_description: 1. Taylor v. Orr - A South Carolina woman claims her newborn son shares the same rare birth defect as a man she met on an online dating site, and she is certain he is the father.

programme.episode_description: Mishaps when people try to perform magic tricks; a musical tribute to cats; pranks including a kid who discovers his mum filled his lunchbox with plastic food.

programme.original_episode_title: A "Eureka" for Solar Energy | Bert Conings | TEDxUHasselt
programme.episode_description: Explore the promise of solar energy with Dr. Conings: Learn how cutting-edge perovskite materials revolutionize global solar power

Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.
SISTA SHOW Episode 3
Music
African Music
Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

programme.local_episode_title: Dairy, Soil test, Banana, Crop Rotation and Vegetables
programme.original_episode_title: Dairy, Soil test, Banana, Crop Rotation and Vegetables
programme.episode_description:
Today we’re in Kirangira Village, Mukono central and we’re meeting with farmer Dorothy Nakalembe. Dorothy’s a very experienced lady who’s been farming since 1980. She has a 3-acre farm where she grows bananas, maize and vegetables .She also has cows but she needs expert advice on them and of course for her vegetables. This is one farmer who knows what she wants!
In this farm we are learning about:
1. Dairy breeding, nutrition and hygiene 2. What to plant after Clearing Banana plantation 3. Soil testing on banana plantation 4. Vegetables transplanting and good farming practices
Today we’re in Kirangira Village, Mukono central and we’re meeting with farmer Dorothy Nakalembe.

programme.episode_description: At Uncle Philip's insistence, Will joins his prep school's poetry club, and he enlists Geoffrey's help when he must present a poet for a reading.
Documentary follows an actress, fashion designer and real estate assistant who attempt to become social media influencers by purchasing fake followers and bots to boost their popularity.

programme.original_episode_title: Change your channel | Mallence Bart-Williams | TEDxBerlinSalon
programme.episode_description: This talk was given at a local TEDx event, produced independently of the TED Conferences. Mallence Bart-Williams introduced her second home Sierra Leone and its talented people, who are part of her project FOLORUNSHO

It is late Spring when Wally, Jeremy, Shades and Mario are at the La Brea Tar Pits working on a school research project. They discover a mysterious tar egg that cracks open to reveal a friendly dinosaur, whom they name "Denver." Keeping their pet dino a secret is a challenge when rock concert promoter Morton Fizzback makes repeated attempts to capture the young dino and use him as the star in his rock 'n' roll show.

Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.
What guys think about girls!
Music
African Music

Today we’re in Bulika village in Mukono and we’re visiting farmer Olivia Kiwombeeka. A very hard-working lady and mother to 14 children. She has a 4-acre farm where she grows coffee, bananas, sweet potatoes, cassava, beans! And don’t forget the cows, the pigs, the goats, the chicken, the pigeons!!!
Where does she find the energy???
In this farm we are learning about:
1. Soil fertility and manure drying and soil testing 2. Pests and diseases control in Coffee plantation 3. Bananas: Good farming practices 4. Orange Fleshed Sweet Potatoes
